flavor_text: Would you like to take a walk in the middle of the blue sea-- together with me?

name: "Koini Naritai AQUARIUM" Kanan Matsuura
ability: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.
【AUTO】 When your other 《Music》 character attacks, this card gets +500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: "Koini Naritai AQUARIUM" Dia Kurosawa
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of your other 《Music》 characters is three or more, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when the damage you received is not canceled, if this card is in the center stage, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.

name: Mari Ohara
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is six or more, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, if this card is in your center stage, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.

name: "Approved♪" Mari Ohara
ability: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other characters get +500 power.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavor_text: Approved---!

name: "Capture Stance" Kanan Matsuura
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.

【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your characters is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is in the back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】.
flavor_text: Heh?

name: "Gentle Smile" Dia Kurosawa
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other characters you have is one or less, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position on the stage."

ability: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area or your opponent's climax area, put this card into your waiting room.

ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your stock is four or more, this card gets +1000 power.

name: "Expectations and Insecurities" Mari Ohara
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (The revealed card is returned to its original place)

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

flavor_text: So, it's been two years…
